name: Sweet Surrender Gelato
address: 12211 No 1 Rd Unit 108, Richmond, BC V7E 1T6, Canada

hasMenuItem.name: Cookies & Cream (473ml)
hasMenuItem.description: Popular for good reasons! Decadent chocolate cookies sprinkled into our signature organic milk gelato.

hasMenuItem.name: Pistachio (473ml)
hasMenuItem.description: An Italian classic! Creamy, nutty, toasty, and aromatic.

hasMenuItem.name: Hazelnut (473ml)
hasMenuItem.description: An Italian classic. It’s aromatic, nutty, earthy, toasty in perfect balance.

hasMenuItem.name: Espresso (473ml)
hasMenuItem.description: Rich and aromatic with a long finish. A great cup of coffee in an edible form.

hasMenuItem.name: Couverture Chocolate (473ml)
hasMenuItem.description: Rich, dark and decadent. No added vegetable fat and only cocoa butter straight from the cacao bean.

hasMenuItem.name: HK Milk Tea (473ml)
hasMenuItem.description: Strong Ceylon black tea from Sri Lanka steeped in our signature organic milk gelato. It’s bold, robust, and fragrant.

hasMenuItem.name: London Fog (473ml)
hasMenuItem.description: A drink that is rumoured to have been invented locally, you get top notes of bergamot, the robust flavours of black tea, and all tied together by our signature organic milk gelato.

hasMenuItem.name: Miso Caramel Swirl (473ml)
hasMenuItem.description: Sweet, buttery and creamy caramel with a salty and umami finish, swirled into our signature organic milk gelato.

hasMenuItem.name: Black Sesame (473ml)
hasMenuItem.description: Rich, earthy, nutty, pleasantly bitter, and smooth.

hasMenuItem.name: Blueberry Cheesecake (473ml)
hasMenuItem.description: Tart, sweet, creamy, and tangy! Our dreamy cheesecake gelato has blueberry compote swirled in for a perfect pairing. Do you know that BC is Canada's largest producer of blueberries?

hasMenuItem.name: Mango Yuzu Sorbetto (Vegan) 473ml
hasMenuItem.description: Yuzu is a sour, tart and very fragrant citrus, which pairs very well with the sweet and tangy mango.

hasMenuItem.name: Peppermint chip (473ml)
hasMenuItem.description: Minty coolness in our signature organic milk gelato, with dark chocolate enrobed cacao nibs.

hasMenuItem.name: Tiramisù - original
hasMenuItem.description: Layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cream, topped with a dusting of cocoa powder.

hasMenuItem.name: Basque cheesecake slice - Original
hasMenuItem.description: Rich, creamy cheesecake with a caramelized top and a slightly burnt edge, offering a smooth and velvety texture in every bite.

hasMenuItem.name: Basque cheesecake slice - Uji matcha
hasMenuItem.description: Rich and creamy Basque cheesecake infused with Uji matcha, featuring a caramelized top and a slightly burnt exterior.

hasMenuItem.name: Basque cheesecake slice - Hojicha
hasMenuItem.description: Rich and creamy Basque cheesecake infused with the roasted flavor of hojicha, offering a unique twist on a classic dessert.

hasMenuItem.name: Basque cheesecake slice - Couverture chocolate
hasMenuItem.description: Rich, creamy Basque cheesecake with a smooth couverture chocolate layer, featuring a caramelized top and a soft, custard-like center.

hasMenuItem.name: Brown butter chocolate chip cookie
hasMenuItem.description: Rich brown butter chocolate chip cookies with gooey chocolate chunks and a hint of sea salt.

hasMenuItem.name: Assorted cookie trio
hasMenuItem.description: Soft and chewy chocolate chip cookies with a hint of sea salt, offering a delightful balance of sweet and savory flavors.

hasMenuItem.name: Chocolate chip pecan cookie
hasMenuItem.description: Crunchy pecans and rich chocolate chips blend seamlessly in this classic cookie.

hasMenuItem.name: Fleur de sel chocolate chip cookie
hasMenuItem.description: Rich chocolate chip cookies sprinkled with fleur de sel, offering a delightful blend of sweet and salty flavors.

hasMenuItem.name: Assorted half dozen cookies
hasMenuItem.description: Soft and chewy cookies with rich chocolate chips, a hint of vanilla, and a touch of sea salt.

hasMenuItem.name: Hazelnut gianduja chip cookie
hasMenuItem.description: Rich chocolate chip cookie with hazelnut gianduja, featuring a blend of smooth chocolate chips and hazelnut flavors.

hasMenuItem.name: Miso peanut butter cookie
hasMenuItem.description: Rich peanut butter cookies infused with savory miso, studded with chocolate chips, and lightly sprinkled with sea salt.

hasMenuItem.name: Hazelnut (473ml)
hasMenuItem.description: An Italian classic. It’s aromatic, nutty, earthy, toasty in perfect balance.

hasMenuItem.name: Pumpkin Spice (473ml)
hasMenuItem.description: A perfect blend of warm spices that evoke that warm and fuzzy feeling! A perfect match for fall colours!

hasMenuItem.name: Blueberry Cheesecake (473ml)
hasMenuItem.description: Tart, sweet, creamy, and tangy! Our dreamy cheesecake gelato has blueberry compote swirled in for a perfect pairing. Do you know that BC is Canada's largest producer of blueberries?

hasMenuItem.name: Cookies & Cream (473ml)
hasMenuItem.description: Popular for good reasons! Decadent chocolate cookies sprinkled into our signature organic milk gelato.

hasMenuItem.name: HK Milk Tea (473ml)
hasMenuItem.description: Strong Ceylon black tea from Sri Lanka steeped in our signature organic milk gelato. It’s bold, robust, and fragrant.

hasMenuItem.name: Lavender (473ml)
hasMenuItem.description: A unique blend of sweet herbal and floral notes, combined with undertones of honey, our lavender gelato highlights the best of what lavender offers as a culinary ingredient.

hasMenuItem.name: Cereal Milk (473ml)
hasMenuItem.description: The best part of breakfast steeped in our signature organic milk gelato.

hasMenuItem.name: Couverture Chocolate (473ml)
hasMenuItem.description: Rich, dark and decadent. No added vegetable fat and only cocoa butter straight from the cacao bean.

hasMenuItem.name: Peppermint chip (473ml)
hasMenuItem.description: Minty coolness in our signature organic milk gelato, with dark chocolate enrobed cacao nibs.

hasMenuItem.name: Miso Caramel Swirl (473ml)
hasMenuItem.description: Sweet, buttery and creamy caramel with a salty and umami finish, swirled into our signature organic milk gelato.

hasMenuItem.name: Black Sesame (473ml)
hasMenuItem.description: Rich, earthy, nutty, pleasantly bitter, and smooth.

hasMenuItem.name: Charcuterie (473ml)
hasMenuItem.description:
Things you would find on a charcuterie board!
Goat cheese: Smooth, creamy, mildly tangy and tart.
Date: Sweet and honey-like.
Maple toasted pecan: Toasty, buttery and nutty.

hasMenuItem.name: Espresso (473ml)
hasMenuItem.description: Rich and aromatic with a long finish. A great cup of coffee in an edible form.

hasMenuItem.name: Hojicha (473ml)
hasMenuItem.description: A type of late-harvest Japanese green tea that is charcoal roasted to give it a distinct earthy hue. It’s mellow, nutty, smoky with undertones of cocoa and caramel.

hasMenuItem.name: Lemon Kumquat Sorbetto (Vegan) 473ml
hasMenuItem.description: A unique pairing of two types of citrus, blending the tangy juices from the flesh and the fragrant oils from the peel.

hasMenuItem.name: London Fog (473ml)
hasMenuItem.description: A drink that is rumoured to have been invented locally, you get top notes of bergamot, the robust flavours of black tea, and all tied together by our signature organic milk gelato.

hasMenuItem.name: Madagascar Vanilla (473ml)
hasMenuItem.description: One of the most complex flavour around with over 200 flavour compounds, the Madagascar Bourbon Vanilla is the most prized cultivar. A perfect pairing with our signature organic milk gelato.

hasMenuItem.name: Madagascar Vanilla (Sugar-free) 473ml
hasMenuItem.description: One of the most complex flavour around with over 200 flavour compounds, the Madagascar Bourbon Vanilla is the most prized cultivar. A perfect pairing with our signature organic milk gelato.

hasMenuItem.name: Pistachio (473ml)
hasMenuItem.description: An Italian classic! Creamy, nutty, toasty, and aromatic.

hasMenuItem.name: Uji Matcha (473ml)
hasMenuItem.description: Grassy, sweet, and pleasantly bitter in perfect balance. A sign of quality only from the Uji region of Kyoto.

hasMenuItem.name: Mango Yuzu Sorbetto (Vegan) 473ml
hasMenuItem.description: Yuzu is a sour, tart and very fragrant citrus, which pairs very well with the sweet and tangy mango.

hasMenuItem.name: Strawberry Rose Sorbetto (Vegan) 473ml
hasMenuItem.description: Surprisingly complementary, the fragrant rose dances on top of the fruity strawberry for only a few moments before disappearing into the background, but it reappears when you least expect it. A truly dynamic pairing!
